title: Contact Dossier Template
description: Complete structure for a contact dossier based on CRM app patterns

company.description: Company name where the contact works

email.description: Primary email address for the contact

role.description: Job title or role of the contact within their organization

tier.description: Priority tier (1 = highest priority, 3 = lowest priority)

status.description: Current engagement status with the contact

research.description: Comprehensive research about the company and contact, including recent news, company focus areas, and strategic initiatives. Should be 2-4 sentences providing context for outreach.
research.example: Adobe Acrobat is a leading document management and PDF solutions company. They are focused on digital transformation and workflow automation. Recent company news indicates they are expanding their enterprise solutions division and investing heavily in AI-powered document processing.

items.description: Specific business challenge or need the contact/company is facing

painPoints.description: Array of 3-6 specific pain points or business challenges the contact is facing
example: Managing document workflows across distributed teams
Need for better integration with existing CRM systems
Seeking automation solutions for repetitive tasks
Looking to improve customer engagement through personalized communications

linkedInMessage.description: Personalized LinkedIn connection or outreach message (150-250 words). Should reference specific company initiatives, demonstrate value proposition, and include a clear call-to-action. Format: greeting, context/hook, value proposition, call-to-action, closing.
linkedInMessage.example:
Hi Sarah,

I noticed Adobe Acrobat is expanding its enterprise solutions division. I've been working with similar companies in the document management space to streamline their workflow automation and CRM integration.

Would love to share some insights on how we've helped companies reduce manual processes by 40% while improving customer engagement.

Are you open to a brief conversation next week?

Best regards

emailMessage.description: Complete email outreach message including subject line (300-500 words). Should include: subject line, personalized greeting, context/research hook, bulleted value propositions, case study reference, clear call-to-action, professional closing. More detailed than LinkedIn message.
emailMessage.example:
Subject: Streamlining Document Workflows at Adobe Acrobat

Hi Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. I've been following Adobe Acrobat's recent expansion in enterprise solutions and am impressed by your focus on AI-powered document processing.

I work with companies in the document management space to optimize their workflow automation and CRM integration. We've helped similar organizations:

• Reduce manual document processing by 40%
• Improve cross-team collaboration efficiency
• Enhance customer engagement through personalized communications
• Seamlessly integrate with existing CRM systems

I'd love to share some specific case studies that might be relevant to Adobe Acrobat's current initiatives.

Would you be available for a 15-minute call next week?

Best regards

content.description: Description of the activity or note content

user.description: Name of the user who created the activity or 'System' for automated entries

activities.description: Chronological log of all interactions and activities with the contact

example.content: Follow-up email sent with case studies
